translation:
Depending on the prompt meeting of the attorneys general of municipality the solution of matters of vital interest to the republic and which have long been reserved to be submitted to the consideration of this Council of patriots, which was considered assembled as soon as the removal of the government to this capital was verified, but which did not thus occur, His Excellency Lord Your Mercies commands

God keep Your Mercies Secretariat of State of Internal Affairs in Caçapava, March 8, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida

Messrs. President and other councilors of the Municipal Chamber of Alegrete. March — 8 — 39. Almeida.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic Municipal Chamber of the town of Alegrete. From the Ministry of the Interior.
